issue.title: [C++] Builders allocate a null bitmap buffer even if there is no nulls
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7764](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7764). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is an optimization where we can coalesce to nullptr if there's no null in the array.
